subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text: {{Han char|rn=75|rad=木|as=05|sn=9|four=41927|canj=DMOB|ids=⿰木丙}}

subSections.title: Chinese
subSections.text: {{zh-forms}}

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|木|t1=wood|丙|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a wooden handle.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=bǐng,bìng
|c=beng3,bing3
|mn=qz,tp,xm:pìⁿ/kh,zz:pèⁿ/qz,xm,zz:pèng
|mn_note=pìⁿ/pèⁿ - vernacular; pèng - literary
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n,c:v
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|六柄|兵柄|刀柄|劍柄|國柄|執柄|大柄|太阿之柄|孢囊柄|尺土之柄|巴柄|把柄|授人以柄|政柄|文柄|斗柄|曲柄笠|朝柄|柄任|柄子|柄政|柄用|柄臣|機柄|權柄|殺生之柄|沒把柄|沒頭脫柄|百年之柄|笑柄|箭柄魚|胚柄|花柄|菌柄|落人笑柄|葉柄|蒴柄|話柄|談柄|貪權竊柄|魁柄}}

subSections.title: References
subSections.text:
* {{R:yue:Hanzi}}

{{zh-cat|Intermediate}}

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=c|rs=木05}}

# a [[handle]], [[lever]], [[knob]]
# a [[design]] or [[pattern]]
# one's [[build]] or [[character]]

subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=ひょう<ひやう
|kanon=へい
|kanyoon=ひ
|kun=え-, かび-, かい-, から-, がら-, つか-, つく-
|nanori=から, ら
}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|え}}
Change in meaning from {{m|ja|枝|pos=''e'', historically ''ye'', “branch, stem”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|え|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
Synonyms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|取っ手|とって|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|取手|とって|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|把手|とって}}

subSections.title: Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|柄の無い所に柄をすげる|え の ない ところ に え を すげる}}: “to attach a handle where there isn't one” → to strain credibility with one's words, to [[talk out one's ass]]

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|かび}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=かび}}. Used in the ''{{w|Kojiki}}''. Generally regarded as cognate with {{m|ja|黴|tr=kabi||mold}}, from the shared idea of [[sprout]]s or [[shoot]]s. Appears to be noun stem of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=かび}} verb {{m|ja|かぶ|tr=kabu}} (source of modern {{cog|ja|黴る}}, ''kabiru'', “to go moldy”), with probable original meaning of {{m|en|sprout|to sprout}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|かび}}

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{m|en|grain}} sense is more commonly spelled {{l|ja|穎}}.

subSections.title: Synonyms
Etymology 3
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|かい}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かい|hhira=かひ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=かい|archaic}} see ''kabi'' above

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|から}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=から}}. Origin of particle {{m|ja|から|tr=kara||from, because}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|から}}

subSections.title: Suffix
Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{m|en|lineage}} sense is often found embedded in other words, such as the first few of the following.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{sense|lineage}} {{ja-r|同胞|はらから}}: “of the (same) belly” → a [[sibling]], more specifically a sibling from the same [[mother]]
* {{sense|lineage}} {{ja-r|族|やから}}: “of the (same) house” → a [[family]] [[member]]
* {{sense|lineage}} {{ja-r|親族|うから}}: “of the (same) parents/ancestors” → a [[blood relative]]
* {{sense|qualities}} {{ja-r|神柄|かみから}}, {{ja-r|神柄|かむから}}: the [[true]] [[nature]] of a [[god]]
* {{sense|qualities}} {{ja-r|山柄|やまから}}: the [[nature]] or [[characteristic]]s of a [[mountain]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|から}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=から|archaic}} {{qualifier|by extension from the ''qualities'' sense}} an [[origin]] or [[source]], a [[reason]] for something

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Often followed by the particle {{ja-r|に}}. This usage evolved into the modern particle {{m|ja|から|tr=kara||from, because}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Etymology 5
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|から}}
In light of the {{m|en|stem}} sense, probably derived semantically from {{m|en|origin}}, {{m|en|source}} meanings.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|から}}

subSections.title: Counter
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|から|counter}}

# used to count items with [[shaft]]s

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|から}}

# the [[trunk]] or [[stem]] of a [[plant]]
# the [[shaft]] of an [[arrow]]
# the [[shaft]], [[haft]], or [[handle]] of a [[tool]]

subSections.title: Prefix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|から|prefix}}

# describes something with a [[stem]], [[shaft]], or [[handle]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{m|en|shaft}} sense is often found embedded in other words, such as the following, which are often spelled with other kanji.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|柄臼|からうす|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|唐臼|からうす|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|碓|からうす}}: a kind of [[mortar]] and [[pestle]] with the pestle mounted on a long [[shaft]] for [[leverage]]
* {{ja-r|柄%秤|から%はかり|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|唐%秤|から%はかり|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|権%衡|から%はかり}}: a [[balance]] [[scale]] (as opposed to a [[spring]] scale)
* {{ja-r|柄%秤|から%ばかり|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|唐%秤|から%ばかり|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|権%衡|から%ばかり}}: same as above
* {{ja-r|柄楫|からかじ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|唐楫|からかじ}}: a [[tiller]] with a [[shafted]] [[handle]]
* {{ja-r|柄鋤|からすき|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|唐鋤|からすき|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|犂|からすき}}: a [[plow]] (literally, “a [[spade]] on a long [[shaft]]”)
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 6
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|がら}}
Alteration of ''kara'', “qualities, characteristics”. Originally only found as a suffix. {{rendaku2|sort=がら|kara|gara}} The rendaku pronunciation was then later used independently.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|がら|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Suffix
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{sense|qualities}} {{ja-r|国柄|くにがら}}: a [[nation]]'s (good) qualities; the state of a nation
* {{sense|qualities}} {{ja-r|人柄|ひとがら}}: a person's [[character]]
* {{sense|qualities}} {{ja-r|家柄|いえがら}}: a family's or household's [[station]] or [[standing]] in [[society]]
* {{sense|qualities}} {{ja-r|続%柄|つづき%がら|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|続き柄|つづきがら}}: one's [[immediate]] [[relation]]s, such as [[parent]]s or [[sibling]]s
* {{sense|qualities}} {{ja-r|場所%柄|ばしょ%がら}}: the qualities of a [[place]]; that which is [[appropriate]] or [[suitable]] for a place
* {{sense|qualities}} {{ja-r|時%節%柄|じ%せつ%がら}}: the qualities of a [[time]] or [[season]]; that which is [[appropriate]] or [[suitable]] for a time or season
* {{sense|shape}} {{ja-r|花柄|はながら}}: a [[flower]] [[pattern]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Noun
Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{sense|build}} {{ja-r|体%付き|から%だつき|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|体%付|から%だつき}}; {{ja-r|なり}}
* {{sense|pattern}} {{ja-r|模様|もよう}}

subSections.title: Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|柄にもない|がら に も ない}}: “not even in one's character” → just not in one, just not suitable for one's character or abilities

subSections.title: Etymology 7
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|つか|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|つか}}

# the [[hilt]] of a [[sword]] or [[knife]], or the [[grip]] of a [[bow]] or [[staff]]
# the portion of a [[brush]] [[pen]] held in the hand
# a [[penis]]

subSections.title: Idioms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|柄を握る|つか を にぎる}}: “to hold the grip” → to [[stay the course]] in a [[career]] or [[trade]] and become an old [[master]]
* {{ja-r|柄を取る|つか を とる}}: “to take the grip” → to [[stay the course]] in a [[career]] or [[trade]] and become an old [[master]]

subSections.title: Etymology 8
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|つく}}
[[nominalization|Nominalization]] of verb {{m|ja|付く|tr=tsuku||to attach}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|つく}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|つく}}

# the [[nock]] on either end of a [[bow#Noun|bow]] where the [[bowstring]] rests
# a [[bent]] [[nail]] or other kind of [[spike]] attached to or driven through an iron [[staff]] or a [[truncheon]] to make the weapon more dangerous
# the areas on either end of a [[yoke]] or other carrying [[pole]] where [[cordage]] or [[rope]] is attached, from which the [[load]] is carried
# the [[grip]] of a [[tiller]], [[boathook]], or other [[pole]]
# {{qualifier|as a pun on the verb sense of ''stick to, attach''}} a female [[entertainer]]'s or [[prostitute]]'s [[secret]] [[lover]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{m|en|grip}} sense is not spelled using the alternative forms, and is only spelled {{lang|ja|柄}} in kanji.

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text: * {{sense|secret male lover}} {{ja-r|隠し 男|かくし おとこ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|隠 男|かくし おとこ}}

subSections.title: Etymology 9
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|ほぞ}}
[[ateji|Ateji]] or [[misspelling]] for uncommon {{m|ja|表外字|tr=hyōgaiji||off-the-chart character|pos=in reference to the chart of official educational kanji}} character {{m|ja|枘|tr=hozo||navel|pos=also generic term for something that [[protrude]]s slightly}}. Note that the right half of {{m|ja|柄}} is {{m|ja|丙}}, with a top bar, while the right half of {{m|ja|枘}} is {{m|ja|内}}, without a top bar.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=irr|ほぞ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR|acc2=1|acc2_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
References
subSections.text: <references/>

subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=[[병]]|eumhun=|rv=byeong|mr=pyŏng|y=pyeng}}

# {{defn|lang=ko|sort=木05}}

subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{vi-hantu|[[bính]]|rs=木05}}

# {{defn|lang=vi|sort=木05}}
